snippet: The father of a teenage Pakistani activist shot in the head by the Taliban for advocating girls’ education has been given a diplomatic post in Britain.
abstract: Father of Malala Yousafzai, teenage Pakistani activist shot in the head by Taliban for advocating girls’ education, has been given diplomatic post in Britain; appointment virtually guarantees that Yoursafzai, who had been recovering in hospital in Britain, will remain in country.
lead_paragraph: The father of a teenage Pakistani activist shot in the head by the Taliban for advocating girls’ education has been given a diplomatic post in Britain.

headline.seo: Pakistani Girl Shot by Taliban Will Stay in Britain
headline.main: Pakistani Girl Shot by Taliban Will Stay in Britain
headline.print_headline: Pakistani Girl Shot by Taliban Will Stay in Britain
